entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning early this evening then changing to flurries at times heavy later this evening and ending this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 50 early this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 2.
